subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With Kasey Keller out, Coach Sigi Schmid was forced to take off midfielder Sebastien Le Toux for the backup goalkeeper Ben Dragavon, who yielded Kansas City’s winning goal to Davy Arnaud in the 80th minute.
snippet: With Kasey Keller out, Coach Sigi Schmid was forced to take off midfielder Sebastien Le Toux for the backup goalkeeper Ben Dragavon, who yielded Kansas City’s winning goal to Davy Arnaud in the 80th minute.
